error.message: Parameter $entity_query of method Drupal\simply_signups\Controller\SimplySignupsController::__construct() has typehint with deprecated class Drupal\Core\Entity\Query\QueryFactory. Deprecated in drupal:8.3.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityStorageInterface::getQuery() or \Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityStorageInterface::getAggregateQuery() instead.
Class Drupal\simply_signups\Plugin\Mail\SimplySignupsPhpMail was not found while trying to analyse it - autoloading is probably not configured properly.
Add core_version_requirement: ^8 || ^9 to simply_signups.info.yml to designate that the module is compatible with Drupal 9. See https://www.drupal.org/node/3070687.
